scripts.build-client: cd client && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && npm run move-dist
scripts.move-dist-windows: if exist public rmdir /s /q public && mkdir public && xcopy /s /e /y client\dist\* public\
scripts.move-dist-unix: rm -rf public && mkdir public && cp -r client/dist/* public/
scripts.move-dist: node -e "if (process.platform === 'win32') { require('child_process').execSync('npm run move-dist-windows', {stdio: 'inherit'}) } else { require('child_process').execSync('npm run move-dist-unix', {stdio: 'inherit'}) }"
